QuestData.Title: Hero's Call: Searing Gorge!
QuestData.Description: By order of his royal highness, King Anduin Wrynn, all able-bodied citizens of the Alliance are to report to Jack Rockleg at Thorium Advance.$B$BSI:7 reports that the Dark Iron dwarves of the Searing Gorge seem to be preparing to attack. Your duty is to learn all you can about their scheming and put a halt to it.$B$BYou can reach the Searing Gorge by following the road west from the Badlands.$B$BFor the glory and honor of the Alliance!
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Jack Rockleg at Thorium Advance in the Searing Gorge.
QuestData.RewardText: We, too, are suspicious of the Dark Irons.
